name: "Sitting Building"
description:
"Sitting Building" is part of the series "The Kingdom of Still" (2012- )
 Through it I imagine and design houses, buildings or factories of the future.
 Chimneys and polluting smoke are banished from the everyday landscape, and are replaced by
 solar collectors and wind turbines, betting on development, in harmony with
 nature.
 I propose buildings with human shapes: heads,
 torsos, complete bodies, with the premise that if those forms are perfect
 for the human being, they are also for architecture.
 This work is made by mixing traditional drawing techniques with digital techniques.
